Player History

Traded from Gashouse to Wisconsin on 1/31/1975 (Going to GHG: P D. Terrill, C A. Hughs, CF C. Durante. Going to WIS: P D. Harnden, P F. Prahl, P G. Lerma, RF S. Stiltner, 1B C. Coll)...
